app_desc.message: Take TweetDeck to the next level!

settings_show_profile_badges_on_top_of_a.message: Show profile badges on top of avatars

settings_make_buttons_smaller_in_the_com.message: Make buttons smaller in the composer

settings_reflect_new_tweets_and_dms_in_t.message: Reflect new tweets and DMs in the tab's title

settings_auto_switch_light_theme.message: Switch to light theme when OS is in light mode

settings_hide_icons_on_top_of_columns.message: Hide icons on top of columns

settings_short_time_after_24h.message: Use a different date format after 24h

settings_custom_css_warning.message: Pasting unknown code in this editor can lead to weird issues if you don't know what you are doing

settings_use_original_aspect_ratio_image.message: Display single images with their original aspect ratio (only for Medium and Large sizes)

settings_display_modern_fullscreen_image.message: Display fullscreen images Ã  la Twitter Web

settings_export_settings_copy.message: Export your settings by clicking the button below

settings_import_settings_copy.message: Import your settings from a JSON file

settings_import_json_wrong_keys.message: Your file does not match the format of Better TweetDeck's settings

settings_import_success.message: Your settings have correctly been imported, don't forget to hit the Save button!

settings_imported_settings_summary.message: Click here to view imported settings

settings_footer_label.message: TweetDeck will need to be reloaded for changes to take effect!

settings_show_account_picker_like.message: Show account picker when clicking on the like button

settings_show_account_picker_follow.message: Show account picker when clicking on the follow button

settings_use_a_custom_width_for_columns.message: Use a custom width for columns

settings_enable_share_item.message: Add a "Share on TweetDeck" item in the browser's contextual menu

settings_add_search_columns_first_in_the.message: Add search columns first in the list

settings_always_characters_left.message: Always show the number of characters left in the tweet composer

settings_better_tweetdeck_ask_tabs.message: Better TweetDeck will ask access to browser tabs for this to work properly

settings_show_like_rt_indicators_on_top_.message: Show like/RT indicators on top of tweets

settings_do_the_same_for_single_images_i.message: Do the same for single images in quoted tweets

settings_also_show_cards_in_columns_with.message: Also show cards in columns with Small media size

settings_check_the_collection_of_css_sni.message: Check the collection of CSS snippets

settings_css_compress_warning.message:
The CSS in the editor will be compressed in order to save space towards your browser's
        storage quota. Meaning some indentation or white space will be removed.

settings_backup_warning.message: Don't forget to keep backups of your work in another place!

settings_usernames_like_picker_allowlist.message: Comma separated list of usernames for which the picker should show (leave empty to always show)

settings_override_translation_language.message: Use a specific language when translating tweets

settings_show_followers_count.message: Show the number of followers next to the follow icon

settings_show_badges_on_mutuals.message: Show badges on mutuals (you follow them and they follow you)

settings_show_a_clear_all_columns_button.message: Show "Clear all columns" button in the sidebar

settings_require_alt_images.message: Disable the tweet button until all images have a description

settings_content_warning_hint.message: We'll check tweets for containing commonly used cw/tw/cn warnings to display these!

settings_show_content_warnings.message: Show content warnings for appropriately marked tweets

settings_show_account_avatars_on_top_of_.message: Show account avatars on top of columns

settings_disable_it_in_the_dm_composer_t.message: Applies to the DM composer too

settings_show_profile_labels_in_tweets_a.message: Show "profile labels" in tweets and profile modals

settings_pronouns_extra.message: Only support English pronouns for now. If you notice any errors, please let me know on @BetterTDeck

settings_extract_pronouns.message: Extract pronouns from users' biography or location and show them within columns

settings_mute_nfts_accounts.message: Mute accounts who use the NFT avatar integration (hexagon-shaped avatar)

settings_require_confirmation_for_block_.message: Require confirmation for block and mute actions

settings_click_this_notification_to_relo.message: Click this notification to reload your TweetDeck tab(s) to grab the newest update!

settings_show_warnings_for_adult_content.message: Show warnings for media with nudity

settings_show_warnings_for_graphic_viole.message: Show warnings for media with graphic violence

settings_show_warnings_for_sensitive_con.message: Show warnings for media with sensitive content

settings_detect_content_warnings_without.message: Detect content warnings without the CW/TW keyword(s)

settings_collapse_tweets_who_match_one_o.message: Collapse tweets who match one of the following keywords:

settings_comma_separated_keywords_matche.message: Comma separated keywords, matched by order in the list

settings_will_match_patterns_like_food_l.message: Will match patterns like "[food] lorem ipsum"

settings_you_can_use_this_to_hide_spoile.message: You can use this to hide spoilers

settings_require_a_confirmation_before_d.message: Require a confirmation before deleting and editing

settings_force_update_banners_to_be_dism.message: Force update banners to be dismissed

settings_dismiss_banner_paragraph.message: In some cases, the banner that shows up after a Better TweetDeck update can have trouble dismissing itself. Click the button below to fix it.

settings_dont_show_pronouns_for_your_own.message: Don't show pronouns for your own accounts

settings_mute_circle_tweets.message: Mute tweets created for Twitter Circles

settings_show_circle_tweets_border.message: Show green border around profile pictures of Circle Tweets
